# Sebastian Iglesias - Software Engineer

> Senior Software Engineer and Teacher | Full Stack Developer | 8+ Years Experience

## Quick Overview

Sebasti√°n Alejo Iglesias is a software engineer and teacher from Argentina with over 8 years of experience in the tech industry. He has worked for major tech companies like MuleSoft/Salesforce and startups like Caribou and Autonoma AI.

**Current Roles:**
- Senior Software Engineer at Allaria+ (2025-Present)
- Teaching Assistant at Universidad Austral (2023-Present)

**Technical Expertise:**
- Languages: Java, Scala, TypeScript, Python, JavaScript
- Frontend: React, Redux, Angular, Next.js
- Backend: Spring, Node.js, Express, Akka
- Cloud: GCP, AWS, Kubernetes, Docker

**Education:**
- Master's in Software Engineering - Universidad Austral (2014-2018)
- Data Science Specialization - ITBA University (2019-2020)

**Notable Projects:**
- Juntadita (juntadita.com.ar) - Expense splitting app
- MatchBuddy - Sports team management platform
- Various open-source tools and utilities

**Contact:**
